name: AI Fantasy Fluff Generator
author: Fizzblizz
description: This generator produces fluff text for any occasion in fantasy roleplaying scenarios. For example, if you need a quick description of a magical item, an NPC or a location. Just input your abstract description and context and it generates text that matches a high fantasy world setting.

config.name: Title
config.description: The head title on the generated card.

config.name: Prompt
config.description: A prompt that describes the abstract of what text you want to generate.
